channel.title: CVE Feed for Japan Construction Information Center -- DENSHI NYUSATSU CORE SYSTEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Japan Construction Information Center -- DENSHI NYUSATSU CORE SYSTEM

item.title: CVE-2022-46287|2024-08-03T14:31:46.329Z -- japan%20construction%20information%20center -- denshi%20nyusatsu%20core%20system
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in DENSHI NYUSATSU CORE SYSTEM v6 R4 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2022-46288|2024-08-03T14:31:46.202Z -- japan%20construction%20information%20center -- denshi%20nyusatsu%20core%20system
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability in DENSHI NYUSATSU CORE SYSTEM v6 R4 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to redirect a user to an arbitrary web site and conduct a phishing attack by having a user to access a specially crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-41993|2024-08-03T12:56:39.160Z -- japan%20construction%20information%20center -- denshi%20nyusatsu%20core%20system
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in DENSHI NYUSATSU CORE SYSTEM v6 R4 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.
